Title: 13 Hours in Islamabad
Writer: Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Alex Gansa, Howard Gordon
Actors: Claire Danes, Rupert Friend, Nazanin Boniadi, Laila Robins
Plot: The security breach at the Embassy has far reaching consequences.
